definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_run_function"><value name="function"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">engiesvanillaextras:cancel_tpa</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_run_function"><value name="function"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute if entity @s[tag=tpa.cancelSender] run tellraw @s {"text":"You have cancelled your previous teleport request.","color":"red"}</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_run_function"><value name="function"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute unless entity @s[tag=tpa.cancelSender] run tellraw @s {"text":"You have cancelled your teleport request.","color":"red"}</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_run_function"><value name="function"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute as @a if score @s tpa.pid = @a[tag=tpa.cancelSender,limit=1] tpa.target run tellraw @s ["",{"selector":"@a[tag=tpa.cancelSender]","color":"red"},{"text":" has cancelled their teleport request.","color":"red"}]</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
